title: Dungeons & Dragons AI Assistant
text:
A web-based AI assistant for Dungeons & Dragons
Work-in-Progress ‚Äî turning prep time into play time.

title: Dungeons & Dragons AI Assistant
text:
‚ú® What Does It Do?
The D&D AI Assistant is a Python-powered chatbot that helps Dungeon Masters run streamlined sessions.
Ask rules questions, roll dice, spawn NPCs, track combat, and even push tokens to your favorite VTT ‚Äî all from one interface.
